articles.description:
$COW token is finally expected to unlock around 3pm UTC today.
This will kick off a 12 week $COW liquidity mining program on @ethereum & @gnosis chain aginst $ETH and $GNO pairs.
On Ethereum $COW pool will be on @BalancerLabs & on gnosis chain it will be on @SwaprEth.

articles.description:
Airdrop for $veCRV and $vlCVX holders.
Lendflare allows you to borrow against your Curve LP tokens.
LendFlare.Finance: 🎁🎁🎁 
We would like to express our gratitude towards @CurveFinance and @ConvexFinance teams and communities for your support and help.
We now give back 1% of total LFT for both $veCRV and $vlCVX holders. Snapshot has been taken and claimable after IDO. 
#borrow_against_crvLP
articles.title: Airdrop for $veCRV and $vlCVX holders. Lendflare allows you to borrow against your Curve LP tokens.

articles.author: DeFi Airdrops 🦇🔊
articles.description:
Not the classic retroactive airdrop but @AmbireWallet is dropping 7.5% of its $WALLET supply over 1 yr to users for simply holding tokens in their wallet.
So e.g if you hold $USDC in your Ambire wallet you get $WALLET dropped everyday.
Rn at $50m tvl the apy amounts to 16%
